settings.text: Your trusted clean conscious Beauty & Wellness Platform.  Partnering exclusively with distinguished global brands, our commitment is to curate a collection of the highest quality products that meet stringent standards for sustainability and ethical practices.  By prioritizing transparency and ingredient integrity, we ensure our offerings are both safe and effective for our discerning GCC customers.

Meet Alia Al Khafajy, a vibrant Emirati entrepreneur rooted in Dubai, whose beauty journey began from a lifetime of trial and error, and a passion for brand discovery.

Embarking on a new venture, founding a distribution company that embraces premium conscious clean beauty, wellness and lifestyle brands that are meticulously and intentially selected, Alia's portfolio features gems like Abel Fragrances, Corpus Naturals, Indie Lee, Khus+Khus and more. Alia's personal touch focuses on collaborating with global brands renowned for their excellence but that also align with regional values setting O K T A apart.

"I'm very excited for what's to come and to share that with you all! A warm thank you to everyone for believing in O K T A & our family of brands. We are grateful for you choosing O K T A and placing your trust with us" - Alia Al Khafajy

custom_css: .media > img {object-fit: contain; object-position: top; border-radius: 0px; padding-left: 0px;}

@media (min-width: 767px) {.banner__box {width: 90% !important; max-width: 100% !important; } .banner__buttons {width: 100%; max-width: 100%; justify-content: space-between; } a {width: auto !important; max-width: max-content; }}
